messages.title: Our Pledges to You:
content: Properly fund the NHS & Mental health
Stop Brexit and start investing in our public services

messages.title: The Problem with Brexit
content: Don’t Fall for the “Get Brexit Done” Lie!
We know most of you, however you voted in 2016, are fed up with Brexit and want it to 'just go away'.

But here's the thing – getting it 'over the line' will not get it done. Whether we leave with Boris' deal, Labour’s deal or No Deal, we will still spend the next decade negotiating our future. Brexit will continue to drain government time and resources and the economy will continue to stagnate.
We will have left, but not arrived anywhere.

If you are fed up with Brexit, then we need to get Brexit GONE. If we revoke article 50 from day one, we can start tackling the real and critical problems facing our nation. The only way to do this is to vote for the Liberal Democrats – and for Sammy Barry on December 12th!
